etymologies: mid 16th century: via French from Turkish tülbent, from Persian dulband. Compare with tulip

definitions: a man's headdress, consisting of a long length of cotton or silk wound around a cap or the head, worn especially by Muslims and Sikhs.
shortDefinitions: man's headdress, consisting of long length of cotton or silk wound round cap or head

definitions: a woman's hat designed to resemble a turban.
shortDefinitions: woman's hat designed to resemble turban

definitions: a marine mollusk with a sculptured spiral shell and a distinctive operculum which is smooth on the inside and sculptured and typically patterned on the outside.

notes.text: Family Turbinidae, class Gastropoda: Turbo and other genera

shortDefinitions: marine mollusc with sculptured spiral shell and distinctive operculum which is smooth on inside
